headline: Constellation Energy (CEG) Strikes 20-Year PPA with Meta, Boosts Nuclear Expansion Plans
summary: We recently published 11 Most Profitable Utility Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds.Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is one of these profitable utility stocks.
